===Release Candidates===
A number of additional libraries are now available as Release Candidates and are ready to be taken for a test drive. Note that Release Candidates have not yet been released for production use, and rely on [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/download.html GWT 1.5.3] or higher.

*Google Maps API Library 1.0 (Release Candidate)*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-maps-1.0.1.tar.gz gwt-maps-1.0.1.tar.gz]
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-maps-1.0.1.zip gwt-maps-1.0.1.zip]

===Older Releases===

The Gears 1.0 library is compatible with the GWT 1.4 release.  Note that prior to version 1.1 of the Gears library (currently a release candidate), the gears distribution was named gwt-google-apis, but only contained bindings for Gears.

* Gears API Library 1.0 *
  * *[http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-google-apis-1.0.0.tar.gz gwt-google-apis-1.0.0.tar.gz]*
